ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:cos7
hdf5:
- 1.14.6
libblas:
- 3.9.* *netlib
libcblas:
- 3.9.* *netlib
liblapack:
- 3.9.* *netlib
suitesparse:
- '7'
target_platform:
- linux-64
tbb_devel:
- '2022'
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.description:
CADET-Core is an open-source software platform offering powerful tools for comprehensive modeling and simulation of biotechnology processes, powered by state-of-the-art numerical algorithms.
CADET-Core supports unit operations such as chromatography, filtration, and crystallization, along with auxiliary components such as hold tanks, tubes, valves, and detectors.
These elements can be interconnected to form complex networks, supporting closed-loop feedback and flexible structures.
about.summary: CADET-Core: The heart of CADET. A modular, fast, and accurate modeling and simulation framework for biotechnology processes.

name: cadet

about.description:
CADET-Core is an open-source software platform offering powerful tools for comprehensive modeling and simulation of biotechnology processes, powered by state-of-the-art numerical algorithms.
CADET-Core supports unit operations such as chromatography, filtration, and crystallization, along with auxiliary components such as hold tanks, tubes, valves, and detectors.
These elements can be interconnected to form complex networks, supporting closed-loop feedback and flexible structures.
about.summary: CADET-Core: The heart of CADET. A modular, fast, and accurate modeling and simulation framework for biotechnology processes.

about.description:
CADET-Core is an open-source software platform offering powerful tools for comprehensive modeling and simulation of biotechnology processes, powered by state-of-the-art numerical algorithms.
CADET-Core supports unit operations such as chromatography, filtration, and crystallization, along with auxiliary components such as hold tanks, tubes, valves, and detectors.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "CADET-Core" %}
{% set version = "5.1.0" %}

package:
  name: cadet
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/cadet/{{ name }}/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 057a2695273278963191af8bac459db77c6aeaf412c3022f48dbb7f6227bc062

build:
  number: 1

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - git
    - cmake
    - make  # [unix]
  host:
    - superlu  # [not win]
    - suitesparse
    - tbb-devel
    - hdf5
    - eigen
    - libblas
    - libcblas
    - liblapack
  run:
    - superlu  # [not win]
    - suitesparse
    - tbb-devel
    - hdf5

about:
  home: https://github.com/cadet/cadet-core
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'CADET-Core: The heart of CADET. A modular, fast, and accurate modeling and simulation framework for biotechnology processes.'
  description: | 
    CADET-Core is an open-source software platform offering powerful tools for comprehensive modeling and simulation of biotechnology processes, powered by state-of-the-art numerical algorithms. 
    CADET-Core supports unit operations such as chromatography, filtration, and crystallization, along with auxiliary components such as hold tanks, tubes, valves, and detectors. 
    These elements can be interconnected to form complex networks, supporting closed-loop feedback and flexible structures. 
  doc_url: https://cadet.github.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/cadet/cadet-core

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - schmoelder
    - jbreue16

about.description:
CADET-Core is an open-source software platform offering powerful tools for comprehensive modeling and simulation of biotechnology processes, powered by state-of-the-art numerical algorithms.
CADET-Core supports unit operations such as chromatography, filtration, and crystallization, along with auxiliary components such as hold tanks, tubes, valves, and detectors.
These elements can be interconnected to form complex networks, supporting closed-loop feedback and flexible structures.
about.summary: CADET-Core: The heart of CADET. A modular, fast, and accurate modeling and simulation framework for biotechnology processes.
